title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 45.2 - Name and marking of red emergency reflector
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 45.2 - Name and marking of red emergency reflector

State Regulations

The device must be given a distinctive name. The approved
name shall be moulded or stamped on the device in letters at least
three-sixteenths inches high so that it is readily legible. Any other letters
or numbers than this distinctive name shall be in smaller
letters. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
45.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
